references.reason: This paper introduces the foundational denoising diffusion probabilistic models (DDPMs), which are the basis for many of the video generation models discussed in the paper.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper details improvements to DDPMs, enabling high-resolution image generation, and is directly relevant to the high-quality video generation that is a focus of this work.
This work extends DDPMs to the generation of videos, offering a strong foundation upon which the single-step video generation techniques explored in this work are built.
This paper presents consistency models, a method for improving the efficiency of diffusion models, which are used in the current work to improve the speed of video generation.

references.paper_title: Stable video diffusion: Scaling latent video diffusion models to large datasets
references.reason: This paper introduces the Stable Video Diffusion (SVD) model, which is the primary model used for fine-tuning and the basis for the experimental comparison in this research.
